test.name: Read Valid Order

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.msg: String '${VALID_ORDER}' used with invalid index 'user_id'. To use '[user_id]' as a literal value, it needs to be escaped like '\[user_id]'.
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
